revision.comment: rename 'words' -> 'terms' in manually-specified affix categories (see [[Wiktionary:Beer parlour/2022/August]])
revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From {{uder|en|grc|ξανθός||yellow}} and {{m|grc|φύλλον||leaf}}, for its color and [[micaceous]] appearance, {{suffix|en||ite}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|-|s}} # {{lb|en|mineral|outdated}} A synonym of [[clintonite]]. The {{w|International Mineralogical Association}}'s Commission on New Minerals, Nomenclature and Classification (CNMNC) recommends using [[clintonite]] as a replacement in all cases.<ref>{{cite-journal|author=<!--over ten authors-->|title=Nomenclature of the Micas|journal=The Canadian Mineralogist|url=http://www.canmin.org/content/36/3/905.full.pdf+html|publisher=The Mineralogical Association of Canada|year=1998|volume=36|issue=3|pages=905-912|issn=1499-1276|oclc=818930682|subscription=y}}</ref> ====Synonyms==== * [[clintonite]] ====References==== <references/> ===Further reading=== * {{R:WebMineral}} * {{R:mindat}} [[Category:English terms prefixed with xantho-]]
